body_html: I thought you meant that we will want to have both sum and sparse_sum which returns the incorrect gradient. In that case we need an entirely new sparse tensor type (which says that "zero" entries are not really zero, but they are "invalid").
body_text: I thought you meant that we will want to have both sum and sparse_sum which returns the incorrect gradient. In that case we need an entirely new sparse tensor type (which says that "zero" entries are not really zero, but they are "invalid").
body: I thought you meant that we will want to have both `sum` and `sparse_sum` which returns the incorrect gradient. In that case we need an *entirely new* sparse tensor type (which says that "zero" entries are not really zero, but they are "invalid").
